content.rendered:
Directed by Neeraj Pathak

Written by Neeraj Pathak. Aakash Pandey. Raaj Shaandilyaa. Shirish Sharma. Sumit Nijhawan. Vijei Joshi

Cast Sunny Deol (Bhaiyaji 3D / Devi Dayal Dubey / Fanny Singh). Preity Zinta (Sapna Dubey). Arshad Warsi (Goldie Kapoor). Ameesha Patel (Mallika Kapoor). Shreyas Talpade (Tarun Porno Ghosh). Jaideep Ahlawat (Helicopter Mishra). Sanjay Mishra (Dr. Gyanprakash Buddhisagar). Brijendra Kala (3D’s Uncle). Amit Mistry (Lucky Singh Laapata). Hemant Pandey (Charsi Bhai). Mukul Dev (Shakeel). Pankaj Tripathi (Gupta (as Pankaj Tripathy)). Ranjeet Bedi (Sapna’s Father (as Ranjeet)). Ashmita Kaur Bakshi (Pinky). Pankaj Jha (Chairman Giriraj Singh). Manoj Joshi (Police Commissioner). Rajeev Mehta (Film Producer Dhandhani). Rajeev Nigam (Patient who does not smile). Evelyn Sharma (Stephanie). Raftaar (Self). Vijay Raaz (Narrator). Neha Mishra (Goldie Kapoor’s Assistant). Gauri Shankar Singh (3D’s Goon). Nawab Shah (Mishra’s Goon). Bobby Bedi (Mishra’s Goon (as Bobby Bedii)). Shreya Arora (Sapna’s Sister 2). Lokesh Tilakdhari (Mishra’s Goon). Vikash Srivastav (Mishra’s Goon). Kharaj Mukherjee (Police Inspector).Prakash Raj.Simran Kaur Mundi.Aakash Pandey . Virender Commando (Bhaiya ji Bodyguard 2). Sahiil Sagar (Gunda in Sunny Deol Gang (credit only)). Gauri Shankar (Dead man (as Gauri S. Singh))

Language Hindi

Producers Fauzia Arshi. Manoj Chaturvedi. Sunny Deol. Chirag Dhariwal. Mahendra Dhariwal. Roysa Rajpurohit. Nishith Verma

Production Metro Movie. Rough Copy Film
